price: តាមពិតយើងបានដឹងនូវអ្វី(រាងកាយ)ក្នុងចំណោមពួកគេ ដែលដីរំលាយ។ ហើយយើងមានសៀវភៅកំណត់ត្រា។
arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qad ʿalim'nā mā tanquṣu al-arḍu min'hum waʿindanā kitābun ḥafīẓun
